        Read translation from database and put to translation cache. This is one should not update access times.

      • getByKey

        public Message getByKey(java.lang.String key,
                        java.lang.String body,
                        java.lang.String keyWords,
                        java.lang.String locale,
                        java.lang.Long siteId)
        Overrides method in parent worker. This one searches in cache
        Overrides:
        getByKey in class TranslatorWorker
        Parameters:
        key - mandatory.
        body - default text. Should not be null.
        keyWords - used for grouping. not mandatory
        locale - specifies in which language this message should be searched. part of the key, mandatory.
        siteId - part of the key. mandatory.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        TranslatorWorker#getByKey(String, String, String, String, String)
